pleaseEnterCodeSentToYourNumber: Please enter OTP sent to your phone number
des1: Report incidents instantly with photos, videos, and location tags. Your report can save lives.Â Together, we build a safer community.
des2: Stay updated on local incidents by quickly filtering incidents by city and incident type, and remain safe by tracking those that may impact you.
des3: If you come across any incident that could threaten your life or safety, the app allows you to hide your identity, with the option to hide your exact location in map.
whyAreYouBlockTheIncident: Why you want to block this incident?
title: Title
fileAlreadySelectedYouWantToReplace: Video/Photo already captured, Do you want to capture new?
areYouSureYouWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
youWantToDeleteAccount: Do you want to delete your account?
youWantToDeleteIncident: Do you want to delete this Incident?
videoUploadLimitText: Max video limit allowed to upload : 20 sec
videoIsSavedInYourGallery: Original video will be saved in your phone's gallery
hideLocationFromOtherUsers: Your Identity will be hidden but, Do you want to hide your exact location in map as well?
mapIsHiddenByTheReporterOfThisIncident: Map is hidden by the reporter of this incident.
ifYouBlockThisIncidentText: If you block this incident, our team will review it and remove it from the app if necessary.
ifYouBelieveThisIsNotAGenuine: If you believe this is not a genuine incident, you can mark it as spam.
